DOC.criteria: Men good health , without history chronic androgen therapy know history gonadal prostate abnormality . PSA ≤ 2 . Age 2555 year Ability understand study , study procedure provide consent Normal serum total T , LH , FSH , urine analysis , sperm count > equal 15million/ml International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) < 10 Normal seminal fluid analysis ( > 20 million sperm/ml ) Agree donate blood treatment recovery period A history evidence prostate breast cancer History invasive therapy BPH History acute urinary retention Current past treatment 5αreductase inhibitor History anti/androgenic drug drug interfere steroid metabolism within past 3 month Severe systemic illness ( renal , liver , cardiac , lung disease , cancer , poorly control diabetes ) Known untreated obstructive sleep apnea Hematocrit > 52 % Skin disease might interfere T gel absorption Hypersensitivity drug use study History bleed disorder anticoagulation History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month History infertility desire fertility within 12 month , current pregnant partner A firstdegree relative ( i.e . father , brother ) history prostate cancer Abnormal digital rectal examination prostate ultrasound
